video.title: Land Girls
video.synopsis: Follow the lives, loves, highs and lows of four members of the Women's Land Army who are working at the Hoxley Estate during WWII.

episodes.synopsis: The girls have their own reasons for joining the Women's Land Army.
episodes.title: Childhood's End

episodes.synopsis: Bea has been hiding her pregnancy from everyone (including her big sister Annie) for three months, but it's becoming increasingly difficult.
episodes.title: Secrets

episodes.synopsis: Three months on, and Annie isn't dealing very well with Harry's death.
episodes.title: Codes of Honour

episodes.synopsis: Farmer Finch hires some "trekkers," families displaced by the bombing, as cheap labor.
episodes.title: Trekkers

episodes.synopsis: Bea prepares for her wedding to Billy and discovers that Finch has doubts about her motives.
episodes.title: Destinies

episodes.synopsis: A new girl arrives at the farm and sets her sights on Billy. Meanwhile, the manor house has been commandeered by the Americans.
episodes.title: Back to the Land

episodes.synopsis: Following his fall, Martin is found to have detached retinas -- but he's also hiding an injured man. Diana tries to help Jack find his grandson.
episodes.title: Displaced Loyalties

episodes.synopsis: Joyce follows Martin and finds the German airman he's been hiding. Finch organizes a boxing match to raise money for Martin's operation.
episodes.title: Final Reckoning

episodes.synopsis: With Joyce still in shock, Connie helps a young evacuee reunite with his sister and mother. Esther asks Vernon for the money for Martin's operation.
episodes.title: Fight the Good Fight

episodes.synopsis: Joyce plans to leave the Land Army, and she forces Tucker into making a confession. Finch learns how Esther got the money for Martin's operation.
episodes.title: Darkest Hours

episodes.synopsis: When Hoxley Manor becomes a makeshift hospital, Lady Ellen is shocked to see Dr. Richard Channing. Connie and Henry celebrate their engagement.
episodes.title: Home to Roost

episodes.synopsis: The land girls take on Vernon Storey and his boys during a ploughing competition, and Connie is rattled by a face from her past.
episodes.title: The War in the Fields

episodes.synopsis: Frank asks Vernon's son to end the feud between them, and romance blossoms between Lady Hoxley and Dr. Channing.
episodes.title: The Enemy Within

episodes.synopsis: Danny threatens to harm Henry if Connie refuses to help him. Esther tells Vernon she had an abortion, while John tells Joyce about his infidelity.
episodes.title: Farewell My Lovely

episodes.synopsis: John's memories return, but Joyce struggles to forgive his infidelity. A face from Danny and Connie's past comes to the village.
episodes.title: Last Days of Summer
